title: LF super chill player for high Silver duo - bot duo or I can jgl
body:
In game name:  Feroplay   - please add me if interested.

Hiya,
Can play either roll in duo bot, or can Jgl if you wanna top/mid.

Chill/mature games, prefer in game voice.   High Silver Elo looking to push to gold.

Cheers

replies.body:
In game name: Noobasaurus

I play bot/jg/sup and am happy to find some more mature players (i'm 32).

Cheerio
